Summary Note:
The RM first met Hernández Suárez Martín at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Hernández Suárez Martín is a seasoned professional with over 40 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Hernández Suárez Martín is currently divorced. His child is named Daniela.
Education Background:
Hernández completed his secondary education at IES Luis Vives Zaragoza in 1980.
After that, he went on to study at University of Valencia until 1985.
Occupation History:
Hernández Suárez Martín is a 63 year old retired Maritime Industry Leader from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Hernández Suárez Martín began his professional journey as a Ship Broker at Elcano Shipping Company S.A. in 1985, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Shipping Company Owner at Transmediterránea S.A., where he continued to grow professionally from 1989 to 1994.
From 1996 to 1999, he served as a Fleet Manager at Transmediterránea S.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He appointment as a Maritime Industry Leader at Peñarroya Shipping S.A. in 2000 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 920000 EUR.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Jerez de la Frontera and Castellón de la Plana, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
